author: neels
msg: * notes/editor-v2.txt: say a few things about atomic replace.

author: rhuijben
msg: Use svn_dirent_*() instead of svn_path_*() on checking for subdirectories.
Initialize iterpool before its first usage.

author: neels
msg: Enable an atomic replace in editor v2.
If you want to know why a revnum is chosen as replace indicator, read
Add parameter REPLACES_REV and pass to callbacks.
